en.subject: CoWhist19 | Activate your account
en.text:
Hej {{PSEUDO}}!
        Account created!
        To activate it, let's go this way:
        {{ACTIVATION_URL}}
        See you soon,
        The CoWhist19 team

fr.subject: CoWhist19 | Active ton compte
fr.text:
Hej {{PSEUDO}}!
        Compte créé!
        Pour l'activer, c'est par ici:
        {{ACTIVATION_URL}}
        A bientôt,
        L'équipe CoWhist19

en.subject: CoWhist19 | Password reset
en.text:
Hej {{PSEUDO}}!
        Password reset?
        Here is a link you need for this:
        {{PASSWORD_RESET_URL}}
        See you soon,
        The CoWhist19 team

fr.text:
